creditline: Gift of David and Lisa Erickson
description: black and grey on cream paper; lines suggesting road or path angled diagonally at bottom of image; five tree trunks topped by large solid black shape as tops of trees; grey background; some geometric shapes in URC and next to tree trunks as leaves; rough finish around edges of paper

title: Untitled (Trees)
